org.spongepowered.api.block

Interface BlockType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Translatable

    public interface BlockType
extends Translatable
    Describes a base type of block.

    Blocks are further differentiated using a BlockState. Complex data, such as inventory contents, are considered data, which is provided via DataHolder.

        getTranslation

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Return the internal ID for the block.

        The format of the internal ID may vary between implementations but in Minecraft, it follows the format of domain:type, an example being minecraft:stone.

        Returns:
        The id

      • getDefaultState

        BlockState getDefaultState()
        Return the default state for this block.
        Returns:
        The default state

      • getStateFromDataValue

        @Deprecated
BlockState getStateFromDataValue(byte data)
        Deprecated. Exists for backwards-compatibility/transitional use
        Get the block state for a given data value.
        Parameters:
        data - The data value to extract into a block state
        Returns:
        Block state with properties set according to the data value

      • getTickRandomly

        boolean getTickRandomly()
        Gets if this BlockType is set to receive random block ticks.

        Random block ticks are most commonly used for growth of plants.

        Returns:
        If the BlockType ticks randomly.

      • setTickRandomly

        void setTickRandomly(boolean tickRandomly)
        Sets if the BlockType should receive random block ticks.

        Random block ticks are most commonly used for growth of plants.

        Parameters:
        tickRandomly - If the BlockType should tick randomly.

      • isLiquid

        boolean isLiquid()
        Gets if the block type is representing a liquid.
        Returns:
        Is liquid

      • isSolidCube

        boolean isSolidCube()
        Gets if a block type is a full and solid block.
        Returns:
        Is solid block

      • isAffectedByGravity

        boolean isAffectedByGravity()
        Gets if this block is affected by gravity (if it will fall when unsupported).
        Returns:
        Is affected by gravity

      • areStatisticsEnabled

        boolean areStatisticsEnabled()
        Gets if a block should be counted for statistics gathering.
        Returns:
        Is counted for statistics

      • getEmittedLight

        float getEmittedLight()
        Gets the amount of light emitted by this block type. The returned value is normalized to have a range of 0 to 1 (1 being the maximum light value), although it is not clamped to this range.
        Returns:
        The amount of light

      • getHeldItem

        com.google.common.base.Optional<ItemBlock> getHeldItem()
        Gets the equivalent ItemBlock for this BlockType.
        Returns:
        The equivalent ItemBlock, if available
